Description:
Detects sign-ins from new countries. The detection considers past activity locations to determine new and infrequent locations.

Author: Mark Morowczynski '@markmorow', Gloria Lee, '@gleeiamglo'
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: New Country
Query: sourcetype='azure-riskdetection' eql select * from _source_ where riskeventtype = 'newcountry'
